michigan-desc: Michigan is a fork of Metrolook 7.0 alpha 2 adapted for the TTSCpedia.
michiganL-desc: The Michigan skin, except it uses a light color scheme
michigan.css: /* CSS placed here will affect users of the Michigan skin */
michiganL.css: /* CSS placed here will affect users of the Michigan Light skin */
michigan.js: /* Any JavaScript here will be loaded for users using the Michigan skin */
michiganL.js: /* Any JavaScript here will be loaded for users using the Michigan Light skin */
skinmichigan-collapsiblenav-preference: Enable collapsing of items in the sidebar (Michigan skin)
